attributes.additional_details:
Each year in November, men in the UK and around the world grow moustaches for Movember. The aim of which is to raise vital funds and awareness for men’s health, specifically prostate cancer and other cancers that affect men.

We want proof that the Coalition government can still work together, and what better way than by convincing David Cameron and Nick Clegg to show their unity by both growing moustaches for Movember.
